Text:
how do you rip these?

i have a streamrip plugin of winamp, but couldnt find the .pls file from this station...

I rip them with WM Recorder 10.2, just go to www.dancedepartment.nl choose english site, than open wm recorder 10.2 en than open previously aired shows. Than click on record, when a stream appears, and just click follow on the previously aired screen. Till you are downloading 4 streams.
